definition[0]: a statement showing the financial state of a business, at the end of a particular period of time, including its BALANCE SHEET, PROFIT AND LOSS ACCOUNT,  and other necessary information
example[0]: The annual financial statement showed that operating profits slipped from £27.9 million to £26.5 million.
example[1]: The company hasn’t filed (=sent to the authorities) its  financial statement for its fiscal year ended March 31.
example[2]: the consortium’s consolidated financial statement (=one showing the results of a group of companies)
definition[1]: another name for SOURCE AND APPLICATION OF FUNDS STATEMENT
